questions.question: He always showed ........................... for work late.
questions.description: To show up is to arrive.

questions.question: I woke ................................ hearing the crowing of the rooster.
questions.description: To wake up is to arouse from sleep.

questions.question: The rich woman is quite fond of showing ............................. her jewels.
questions.description: To show off is to demonstrate haughtily.

questions.question: The stalker was ordered to keep .................................... from his victim.
questions.description: To keep away is to remain at a distance.

questions.question: He was too tired and passed .................................
questions.description: To pass out is to faint. To pass away is to die.

questions.question: She would finish one project and then just go .............................. to the next.
questions.description: To go on is to continue.

questions.question: After dad lost his job, we are struggling to get ..............................
questions.description: To get by is to survive.

questions.question: He injured his head and lost consciousness but came ............................. again after a few minutes.
questions.description: To come to is to regain consciousness.

questions.question: They swore that they would never come .................................... to that place.
questions.description: To come back is to return to a place.

questions.question: Susan dropped ............................... yesterday.
questions.description: To drop by is to visit without appointment.

questions.question: The old car always breaks ............................... just when I need it the most.
questions.description: To break down is to stop functioning.
